judges: Before Maxby, C. J., Dbew, Linn, Steen, Pattebson, Steaene and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Judgments affirmed on the opinion of Judge Alessandroni ; costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Raymond A. White, Jr., for appellant.
Geoffrey J. Cunnijf with him Henry D. O’Connor and Shoyer, Rosenberger, Highley & Burns, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Bauer, Admrx., v. Sacks, Appellant.
Argued December 4, 1946.
Before Maxby, C. J., Dbew, Linn, Steen, Pattebson, Steaene and Jones, JJ.
Raymond A. White, Jr., for appellant.
Geoffrey J. Cunnijf with him Henry D. O’Connor and Shoyer, Rosenberger, Highley & Burns, for appellee.
January 9, 1947:
